channel.title: Interface
channel.description:
Dear moparscape,
I have the following issue. [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/15q5kpv.png[/img] I've been long gone from the rsps scène but wanted to try it again. I want to make the above interface but my problem is het infacing swords are too close to each other so the text is under it. Is there any way I can move the swords without editing the interface in any edit program like paint? Or do I need to use another interface?
Thanks in advance, Halflive9

item.title: Interface
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Pure_:

You might be showing the wrong interface, pretty sure the correct id will have the swords displaced correctly. Search an ID list or use lins interface editor to drag the sprites apart.

Okay, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You might be showing the wrong interface, pretty sure the correct id will have the swords displaced correctly. Search an ID list or use lins interface editor to drag the sprites apart.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:2, topic:544940”]i dont think it would be possible without editing the interface, but why don’t you try changing the text?

public void sendOption4(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Dough", 2481); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2482); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2483); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2484); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 2485); c.getPA().sendFrame164(2480); }

maybe you could change it to select a dough?[/quote]
Well that’s possible. But I’m trying to add the dough interface. I’ve searched some interface lists but haven’t found it. So I’m not sure wether it’s a an actual interface or something modified like I’m doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Interface
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

i dont think it would be possible without editing the interface, but why don’t you try changing the text?

public void sendOption4(String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Dough", 2481); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2482); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2483); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2484); c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 2485); c.getPA().sendFrame164(2480); }

maybe you could change it to select a dough?

Read full topic
